aka: Wyprawa po skarby z Bettany Hughes
this_title: Bettany Hughes' Treasures of the World Season 3
trans_title: 贝塔尼·休斯的世界宝藏 第三季
Wyprawa po skarby z Bettany Hughes
introduction: Travelling to places that are rich with amazing civilisations, unfolding excavations and startling new discoveries, Treasures With Bettany Hughes returns showcasing extraordinary people who broke the rules to change the destiny of humankind and archaeological wonders that shaped the story of the world.Bettany discovers remote communities, fresh archaeological digs, and unexpected stories across Albania, Oman, Albania & The Adriatic, Estonia, Azerbaijan – Silk Roads & The Caucasus & Bulgaria. An immersive, joyful, once in a lifetime journey to the heart of the human story. Compelling. Unforgettable. Inspiring.S3 E1 Albania and the AdriaticS3 E2 EstoniaS3 E3 GeorgiaS3 E4 BulgariaS3 E5 AzerbaijanS3 E6 Eastern Mediterranean
chinese_title: 贝塔尼·休斯的世界宝藏 第三季
foreign_title: Bettany Hughes' Treasures of the World Season 3
